attributes.additional_details:
Stop selling off the infrastructure of the UK, be it roads, the NHS, etc, privatisation may give a good short-term benefit, but in the long term, we are going to lose control of our roads and hospitals.

If private companies are running them, they need to be making a profit. Why not run them ourselves and pocket that profit for the good of the taxpayer? This will only result in paying out extra cash to investment capital companies, and the common taxpayer will lose out, yet again.
